name: Roasted Nuts
description:
You are a rock selling roasted nuts to a picky potted plant. Pick nuts correctly to raise your score, incorrectly picked nuts will lower your score. How many nuts can you sell in 30 seconds?

Also doubles as a clicks-per-minute tester, spam-click on the wrong nut and see how low you can go!

Made for Low Effort Game Jam 21, enjoy lol. Refresh to try again.
